message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's a fair starting point, considering the inflation will impact your share more significantly.
Considering the inflation, I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 55/45 split in my favor is still fair considering the inflation. Let's reach an agreement before we lose more money.
We're both losing value, let's meet closer to the middle. 58/42 is my new proposal.
